roleset.name: (cause to) become separate, separate
roleset.note: SEPARATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'separate' based on financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet; adjectival 'separated' based on BOLT-2,3. Member of Vncls separate-23.1-2, remove-10.1, classify-29.10. (from separate.01-v)
SEPARATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on separate-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls separate-23.1-2, remove-10.1. (from separation.01-n)
SEPARATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from separated.01-j)

example.name: separate-v: all args
example.text: The Washington, D.C., think tank recommends that [the courts]-1 adopt different ``tracks'' for different types of civil cases in order *trace*-1 to separate the handling of highly complex suits from simpler ones.
example.arg: the handling of highly complex suits

example.name: separated-j
example.text: It seems like it 's pretty separated from any harm to the animal .
example.arg: from any harm to the animal

example.name: separation-n: args 1 AND 2!
example.text: This intervention resulted in a peace agreement with unfair conditions that are considered a prelude to the separation of the south from the north ...

example.name: separation-n: arg1 with LOC
example.text: America seemed to him to be the single country in the world who has managed to apply the separation of powers between the judiciary , the executive , and the legislative in a better way than any other country .
example.arg: between the judiciary, the executive, and the legislative

example.name: separation-n: multiple things separated in a single arg
example.text: That is , whether there should be a separation of politics and economics or not .

example.name: separation-n: arg0, and PRD
example.text: Descartes' "I think, therefore I am" statement and his separation of mind-body into two.

roleset.name: not together
roleset.note: SEPARATE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from separate.01-j)

example.name: separate-j
example.text: The capital budget is separate from the base state operations budget
example.arg: from the base state operations budget
